entries.name: continue_entry_body(entry_body, continuation)
entries.desc: Attaches the continuation of the previous line to the entry_body.

entries.name: create_document(groups)
entries.desc: Creates an RDoc::Markup::Document given the groups of ChangeLog entries.

entries.name: create_entries(entries)
entries.desc: Returns a list of ChangeLog entries an RDoc::Markup nodes for the given entries.

entries.name: create_items(items)
entries.desc: Returns an RDoc::Markup::List containing the given items in the ChangeLog

entries.name: parse_entries()
entries.desc: Parses the entries in the ChangeLog.

entries.name: scan()
entries.desc: Converts the ChangeLog into an RDoc::Markup::Document
